transArray.content: Came here to watch the concert. It's nearby and the room is very clean. It's pretty good.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to be able to provide you with warm service and a clean and comfortable stay environment. As you said, the hotel is located in the West Fourth Ring Road In the Badili Automobile Park on the auxiliary road, only 4 kilometers away from Wukesong Stadium, the transportation is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition, so that all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are confident on the road ahead. We look forward to working with you every day. An encounter! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
